DescriptionData.Title: Hula Hoop, Home Leisure Abdomen Beautiful Waist Belly Pull Ring Sports Auxiliary Tools Ladies Children
DescriptionData.Description:
Welcome to LYTLD. Every day, keep exercising and make your and your family healthy and happy lives.

★ Make Fitness Fun
Remember how much fun you had hula hooping as when you were younger? Well, imagine doing it with a hula hoop that's specially designed to burn calories, tone your stomach and strengthen your core. The Core Balance Weighted Hula Hoop is here to make fitness fun.

★ Fitness Exercise Hula Hoop
Basic hula hooping can burn up to 210 calories per 30 minute workout.Unique soft fitness hoop gives you maximum protection and provide a easier way for you to loose weight, get in better shape. Increase coordination and burn bat to get more slim waist, better for cardio and dance exercise.

★ Specifications:
Color: Tricolor assembly
Diameter: 55cm(21.7in)
Weight: 1.0kg
Material: PVC / ABS / steel wire

★ Package List:
1 x Hula Hoop

★ Note:
- There may be 1 inch difference in measurement since it is hand measured.Hope you do not mind it.
- There may be a little color difference due to different monitor settings.Thank you for your understanding.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: GOOD COMFORT: The soft hula hoop has a massage effect on the abdomen during exercise. There is no pain when touching the body, and the human body feels more comfortable.
OUTDOOR OR INDOOR ACTIVITY: Play in outside on the lawn of your backyard, in the gym, on the playground, or have a contest to see how can hoop the most! Makes a great birthday idea too.

FUN WAY TO KEEP FIT: Hula Hoop is an easy, effective and fun way to burn calories, strengthen your core and slim your waistline. Improve your posture, increase your flexibility, strengthen your back and firm your abs, glutes and hams.
MORE USES: Hoops are popular sporting equipment for obstacle training, gym routines, overall fitness and exercise. Hoops add fun and make the best ab and core workouts.

CUSTOMER SERVICE: If you have any questions, please contact us(LYTLD) and we will solve it within 24 hours. Please feel free to contact our customer service team to give feedback on your situation. We are very happy to provide guidance and services.
DescriptionData.SearchTerms: weighted foam padded fitness exercise hula hoop wave groove design folding adujustable width youth adults ladies with waist ruler hoops uv travel hoop exercise dance divides into parts simple quick compact portable equipment personal gym workout

DescriptionData.Title: Hula Hoop, No Noise and No Falling Sand, Adjustable Diameter, Easy to Install and Remove, Weight Loss Adult Fitness
DescriptionData.Description:
Welcome to LYTLD. Every day, keep exercising and make your and your family healthy and happy lives.

★ Make Fitness Fun
Remember how much fun you had hula hooping as when you were younger? Well, imagine doing it with a hula hoop that's specially designed to burn calories, tone your stomach and strengthen your core. The Core Balance Weighted Hula Hoop is here to make fitness fun.

★ Fitness Exercise Hula Hoop
Basic hula hooping can burn up to 210 calories per 30 minute workout.Unique soft fitness hoop gives you maximum protection and provide a easier way for you to loose weight, get in better shape. Increase coordination and burn bat to get more slim waist, better for cardio and dance exercise.

★ Specifications:
Color: Gray-black
Diameter: 100cm(39.4in)
Weight: 1.8kg
Material: PP engineering plastic, NBR rubber foam

★ Package List:
1 x Hula Hoop

★ Note:
- There may be 1 inch difference in measurement since it is hand measured.Hope you do not mind it.
- There may be a little color difference due to different monitor settings.Thank you for your understanding.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: NO NOISE AND NO FALLING SAND: PP thickened engineering plastic, solid structure, there is no need to install sand or rice grains, there is no noise during use, and there will be no trouble of falling sand or rice.

NBR RUBBER SHOCK ABSORPTION AND DECOMPRESSION: The outer layer is wrapped with NBR rubber foam buffer layer, which greatly reduces the impact force on the body fat muscles when turning the hula hoop at high speed, reduces the pain in the waist and abdomen, and improves the user's comfort.

THE DIAMETER CAN BE ADJUSTED: The 8-section full installation standard diameter is 100cm, which is suitable for most users. For example, when the space at home is relatively small, a maximum of one section can be disassembled and the diameter is reduced to about 85cm.
OUTDOOR OR INDOOR ACTIVITY: Play in outside on the lawn of your backyard, in the gym, on the playground, or have a contest to see how can hoop the most! Makes a great birthday idea too.

CUSTOMER SERVICE: If you have any questions, please contact us(LYTLD) and we will solve it within 24 hours. Please feel free to contact our customer service team to give feedback on your situation. We are very happy to provide guidance and services.
